EmailTemplate.name: Desktop - Closing
EmailTemplate.subject: Master Administrator Claim
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.Contact}, Regarding Company: {!Case.Account}
Unfortunately the information provided in regards to the Master Administrator Primary Contact change has not proved ownership of this account. We still require additional documents that prove you have legal right to the QuickBooks Desktop account including subscription, products, and licenses. No changes will be made at this time. To continue your claim please send the following documents so that we may verify this:
Include the following information and attach it to this email:
Case# (--------)
Customer Account Number: (--------)
Company Name: (--------)
We are closing your case for now. However, the claim will be reopened if you email the documentation requested in this email within the next 30 days.
Sincerely,
The QuickBooks Desktop Support Team
